definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]

sentences.english: How to explain the formation and meaning of the following compounds?
sentences.chinese: 如何解釋所給複合詞的構成及意思？

sentences.english: Metaphor project on different levels of compound words.
sentences.chinese: 隱喻在複合詞中的投射有不同層面。

sentences.english: Do not capitalize each word in so-called closed-form compound words.
sentences.chinese: 不要將所謂的緊湊格式複合詞中的每個單詞都大寫。

sentences.english: Modern Chinese two-syllable compound words many of the quantity, uses widely.
sentences.chinese: 現代漢語雙音節複合詞的數量多，用途廣。

sentences.english: The conveyance of causativity is an important feature of Chinese resultative V-V compound.
sentences.chinese: 表達致使是漢語動補複合詞的重要特徵。

sentences.english: In compounds, the two lexical morphemes can be of different word classes.
sentences.chinese: 複合詞中，兩個詞彙語素可能是不同的詞類。

sentences.english: Describing the morpheme order of bisyllabic copulative compound.
sentences.chinese: 描寫雙音節並列式複合詞語素的組合狀況。

sentences.english: Separating a compound word into two meaningful words.
sentences.chinese: 將一個複合詞分成兩個有意義的單詞。

sentences.english: The second chapter is"side-by-side compound words of Jinwen Shangshu".
sentences.chinese: 第二部分爲“今文《尚書》並列複合詞”。

sentences.english: Follow that, study classification of compound words of telescopic form.
sentences.chinese: 再接下來對兼語式複合詞進行分類。

sentences.english: The third chapter is"modifier-head compound words in Jinwen Shangshu".
sentences.chinese: 第三部分爲“今文《尚書》偏正複合詞”。

sentences.english: The first chapter is"composite standard definition of compound words in Jinwen Shangshu".
sentences.chinese: 第一部分爲“今文《尚書》複合詞的界定標準”。

sentences.english: English loves compound words: 'washing machine' and all that sort of thing.
sentences.chinese: 英語多喜複合詞，像是“洗衣機”啊這一類的。

sentences.english: The fourth chapter is"other compound words of Jinwen Shangshu".
sentences.chinese: 第四部分爲“今文《尚書》其它結構複合詞”。

sentences.english: What are the main features of the English compounds?
sentences.chinese: 英語複合詞的主要特徵是什麼？
